name: Michael Brooks
bio: Veteran director with 25+ years capturing authentic storytelling in country and folk music videos. Known for his natural cinematography with emotional depth and connection to rural American landscapes.

visual_style.description: Natural cinematography with emotional depth, authentic rural storytelling, golden-hour aesthetics, heartland Americana

camera_preferences.shot_composition: Natural rule of thirds, horizon lines, breathing space, foreground elements
camera_preferences.camera_notes: Prefers natural framing, uses wide shots for context, intimate close-ups for emotion

key_techniques: Golden hour as primary light source
Natural bounce from earth and sky
lighting_style.mood_lighting: Warm, natural, soft shadows, embracing organic imperfections

editing_style.pace: Slow and contemplative, letting moments breathe
editing_style.rhythm_approach: Emotional pacing, cuts on lyrical moments and story beats

storytelling.narrative_approach: Character-driven narratives about family, home, loss, and resilience
storytelling.symbolism_level: Medium - uses nature, seasons, and objects as emotional metaphors

post_production.color_grading_style: Film-like warmth, golden hour glow, organic skin tones, natural contrast
post_production.vfx_approach: Minimal to none - purely authentic practical filmmaking

key_priorities: Rural and natural environments (fields, farms, forests, rivers)
Golden hour lighting with warm sun flares
Wide landscape shots showing connection to land
